department: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME}, GONOW TO ITS NEW CLOSING TIME @ MAY 11, 2023 BY 2 :00 PM
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada Real Property Branch have a requirement to tender this project on behalf of Correctional Service Canada to Design and Construct a Temporary Construction Zone (TCZ) as a pre-requisite for the new 96 bed living unit project. The Contractor must perform and complete the work by March 31, 2024.
